thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com
thread.title: Daniela Fania

author: Daniela Fania
title: Daniela Fania
text:
I happened to know SPOT a HOME last year, when they got in touch with me to take pictures/video of my Mother's house in Milan, we use to share-rent to university students.
I immediately understood their level of professionalism watching their Fotographer working on his Photo/Video-service:
kind, fast and professional.
The same impression I got talking to them on the phone about rooms availability/renting conditions and Student characteristics.
I don't think it's easy to find another such professional Company in this borning/fast growing market.
They are really extremely nice/kind/fast/competent and professional to deliver a very useful service to tenants and to landlords overallspeaking.
THANKS a LOT for WORKING so nicely and smoothly ALL TOGETHER to create a "Great Big Team" (GBT) including Tenants, Landlords and SPOT a HOME Members...!!
Have a nice evening/day...tomorrow...y...Buen Trabajo a todos...!! ;););)
Daniela Fan√¨a
Milan, Italy
